nodes.text: Lyo was an Abyssin smuggler. Along with Creethe and another Abyssin, Lyo smuggled nerve disruptors to Asusto, waiting for a buyer. The Jedi Lene Kostana, Sifo-Dyas, and Dooku, who were on a mission to Asusto, encountered the smugglers, and Dooku killed them in anger.
Lyo first appeared in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. While not named in the audiobook, Lyo's name was given in the script.
